description.name: Farasi Mpesa
description.tagline: Securely accept online payments using mpesa and auto validate invoices.
description.long: Farasi Mpesa is the fast, easy, secure way to accept Mpesa payments online. Most of users know and trust the Lipa na Mpesa Payment solution online.
features: Use of STK push when making payments
Enable option for auto validate payments
Supports till numbers and paybill numbers
Incase of over payment the module adds the balance to user account
Record transaction code and validate invoice
Allows partial payment on an invoice
